programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan
programme.desc: Tandem Ng Bayan brings you discussions on the day's top news stories, providing analysis and engaging in commentary on political as well as social issues.

programme.title: Magandang Buhay
programme.desc: "Momshies" Jolina Magdangal, Melai Cantiveros, and Regine Velasquez kick off the morning with good vibes as they share a chat with celebrities on topics easily relatable to Filipino families.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: TV Patrol Express Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: TV Patrol Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 191
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 192
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 43
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 188
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 2
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: \"Manyika\" (lit. 'Doll') and \"Banana Q\".

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 8
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 189
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 44
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 6
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 3
programme.desc:
‘Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: \"Manyika\" (lit. 'Doll') and \"Banana Q\".

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 10
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Carpool ep 5
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 5
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 3
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 3
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 19
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 2
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: It follows Marj, a woman from Cebu, doing everything to provide and care for her mother and mentally challenged brother, who would turn heartbreak and defeat as drive to work harder in the Metro and, eventually, would find love. But just when she thought she found home in the family she has created, secrets unravel and lies after lies unfold.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.desc: The Philippines's premier award-winning agriculture show. The program showcases success stories in Filipino innovation, resilience, and growing agribusiness opportunities.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Global Pinoy Unlimited
programme.desc: Global Pinoy Unlimited features community news, Pinoy headliners and their significant contributions to the community, as well as special kababayan and Kapuso happenings across the globe.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre Marathon
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'Yung Libro Sa Napanuod Ko'
programme.desc: A book author, Lisa and a Korean fan, Kim Gun Hoo meet and tour South Korea's towns together. As they spend more time with each other, Lisa eventually learns a past that apparently Gun Hoo was a big part of. Feeling confused and betrayed, Lisa disappears from his life again but later on makes him her inspiration in her second book. They reunite and this time, they promise to stay together.

programme.title: All
programme.desc: GMA's weekend musical comedy variety show that showcases a fun musical experience.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Kung Kailangan Mo Ako
programme.desc: The cranky and ill-natured Sharon Cuneta was the vital witness in a celebrated case and the guilty parties would do anything to put her away. While she had been trying to flee from her pursuers in a cab driven by Rudy Fernandez, they got into an accident, which made her lose her memory.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic \u0026 Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Burlesk Queen
programme.desc: One of the classics of Philippine cinema wherein screen ingenue Vilma Santos made her transition into matured actress. Into this world came the young girl who becomes its last shining star. But as her presence brought life into the old art, her own existence is endangered by the decaying surroundings.

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Tumayo Ka't Lumaban
programme.desc: Crisanto (Ronnie Ricketts) is a man with a mission. Circumstances have forced him and his sister to be raised by separate foster families. But now, Crisanto is determined to find his sister.

programme.title: Adan Lazaro (Search and Destroy)
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon portrays Adan Lazaro, a highly specialized intelligence agent who returns to his motherland to stop a group of terrorists who are out to wreck havoc to the country's ailing economy.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Bobby Barbers, Parak
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life exploits of Bobby Barbers, Secretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government. It chronicles his life as a young lawyer, a politician and most of all as the celebrated no-nonsense law-enforcer, who became the scourge of wrong-doers all over the country.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Tinik Sa Dibdib (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a searing drama about a young woman who got married to escape from her family of parasites only to find herself in a worse situation.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Friends In Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Isla 2
programme.desc: Celso Ad Castillo once again directs with newcomer Via Veloso in the title role of Isla, the young girl who will do anything just to be able to escape her lustful adoptive father and the desolate island where she might spend her entire life.

programme.title: Anino Ni David Crusado
programme.desc: Three friends --- Macario (George Estregan), Alvaro (Conrad Poe) and David (Dante Varona) dare to lead the farmers in an uprising against the cruel reign of the Montalvos. But this is cut short as they are ambushed and left to die.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: Popular singing duo Vingo and Jimmy, collectively known as the April Boys, brought the real life tale of their climb to fame to the big screen.

programme.title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?
